io.permazen

Interface Session.TransactionalAction

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Session.HasTransactionOptions, Session.RetryableAction
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractTransactionRaftCommand.RaftTransactionAction, EvalCommand.EvalAction
    Enclosing class:
    Session

    public static interface Session.TransactionalAction
    Tagging interface indicating an Session.Action that requires there to be an open transaction.

    A new transaction will be created if necessary before this action is executed. If a transaction already exists, it will be (re)used.
